9#include <queue>

11#include "src/base/platform/condition-variable.h"

18namespace v8 {
19namespace internal {
20
21class LocalHeap;
22class TurbofanCompilationJob;
23class RuntimeCallStats;
24class SharedFunctionInfo;
25
26// Circular queue of incoming recompilation tasks (including OSR).
27class V8_EXPORT OptimizingCompileDispatcherQueue {
28 public:
29 inline bool IsAvailable() {
30 base::MutexGuard access(&mutex_);
31 return length_ < capacity_;
32 }
33
34 inline int Length() {
35 base::MutexGuard access_queue(&mutex_);
36 return length_;
37 }
38
39 explicit OptimizingCompileDispatcherQueue(int capacity)
40 : capacity_(capacity), length_(0), shift_(0) {
41 queue_ = NewArray<TurbofanCompilationJob*>(capacity_);
42 }
43
44 ~OptimizingCompileDispatcherQueue() { DeleteArray(queue_); }
45
46 TurbofanCompilationJob* Dequeue() {
47 base::MutexGuard access(&mutex_);
48 if (length_ == 0) return nullptr;
49 TurbofanCompilationJob* job = queue_[QueueIndex(0)];
50 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(job);
51 shift_ = QueueIndex(1);
52 length_--;
53 return job;
54 }
55
56 void Enqueue(TurbofanCompilationJob* job) {
57 base::MutexGuard access(&mutex_);
58 DCHECK_LT(length_, capacity_);
59 queue_[QueueIndex(length_)] = job;
60 length_++;
61 }
62
63 void Flush(Isolate* isolate);
64
65 void Prioritize(Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> function);
66
67 private:
68 inline int QueueIndex(int i) {
69 int result = (i + shift_) % capacity_;
70 DCHECK_LE(0, result);
71 DCHECK_LT(result, capacity_);
72 return result;
73 }
74
75 TurbofanCompilationJob** queue_;
76 int capacity_;
77 int length_;
78 int shift_;
79 base::Mutex mutex_;
80};
81
82class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE OptimizingCompileDispatcher {
83 public:
84 explicit OptimizingCompileDispatcher(Isolate* isolate);
85
86 ~OptimizingCompileDispatcher();
87
88 void Stop();
89 void Flush(BlockingBehavior blocking_behavior);
90 // Takes ownership of |job|.
91 void QueueForOptimization(TurbofanCompilationJob* job);
92 void AwaitCompileTasks();
93 void InstallOptimizedFunctions();
94
95 inline bool IsQueueAvailable() { return input_queue_.IsAvailable(); }
96
97 static bool Enabled() { return v8_flags.concurrent_recompilation; }
98
99 // This method must be called on the main thread.
100 bool HasJobs();
101
102 // Whether to finalize and thus install the optimized code. Defaults to true.
103 // Only set to false for testing (where finalization is then manually
104 // requested using %FinalizeOptimization).
105 bool finalize() const { return finalize_; }
106 void set_finalize(bool finalize) {
107 CHECK(!HasJobs());
108 finalize_ = finalize;
109 }
110
111 void Prioritize(Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> function);
112
113 private:
114 class CompileTask;
115
116 enum ModeFlag { COMPILE, FLUSH };
117 static constexpr TaskPriority kTaskPriority = TaskPriority::kUserVisible;
118 static constexpr TaskPriority kEfficiencyTaskPriority =
119 TaskPriority::kBestEffort;
120
121 void FlushQueues(BlockingBehavior blocking_behavior,
122 bool restore_function_code);
123 void FlushInputQueue();
124 void FlushOutputQueue(bool restore_function_code);
125 void CompileNext(TurbofanCompilationJob* job, LocalIsolate* local_isolate);
126 TurbofanCompilationJob* NextInput(LocalIsolate* local_isolate);
127
128 Isolate* isolate_;
129
130 OptimizingCompileDispatcherQueue input_queue_;
131
132 // Queue of recompilation tasks ready to be installed (excluding OSR).
133 std::queue<TurbofanCompilationJob*> output_queue_;
134 // Used for job based recompilation which has multiple producers on
135 // different threads.
136 base::Mutex output_queue_mutex_;
137
138 std::unique_ptr<JobHandle> job_handle_;
139
140 // Copy of v8_flags.concurrent_recompilation_delay that will be used from the
141 // background thread.
142 //
143 // Since flags might get modified while the background thread is running, it
144 // is not safe to access them directly.
145 int recompilation_delay_;
146
147 bool finalize_ = true;
148};
149} // namespace internal
150} // namespace v8
151
152#endif // V8_COMPILER_DISPATCHER_OPTIMIZING_COMPILE_DISPATCHER_H_
